lemma bigo_measure_trans: fixes t :: "'a \<Rightarrow> real" and t' :: "nat \<Rightarrow> real" and m :: "'a \<Rightarrow> nat" and f ::"nat \<Rightarrow> real" assumes "\<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> t x \<le> (t' o m) x" and "t' \<in> O(f)" and "\<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> 0 \<le> t x" shows "t \<in> O[m going_to at_top within A](f o m)"
